title: Obsession
description: PLEASE NOTE: This book was blocked for publication by Amazon due to "content violations" and as such it is no longer available. Due to Fear & Fidelity and Pain & Punishment being blocked by Amazon, the release of Lust & Loathing and Hope & Humiliation will no longer occur. I will be re-writing the Duplicity Trilogy to remove the content Amazon feels violates its T&Cs and anticipate releasing the trilogy plus a free prequel novel in late November 2022. These new stories will include the characters you've come to love, however the motorcycle club will have a name change and some other details will be altered to minimise reader confusion. Whilst the paperbacks were not subject to the same ban by Amazon, I will remove them from sale as well since the rest of the series will no longer be released in ebook. If you want to know how the Venom/Lily/Slash love triangle ends, keep an eye out for the new titles by subscribing to my VIP reader update (link in bio). In the meantime, Discord & Harmony (a reverse harem rock star romance standalone) will release on August 31st, 2022. I appreciate your patience and understanding with this issue that is completely out of my control. Bella xo
author: Bella Faust
